Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpmProject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    This class contains methods need for color identification This method is achieved by ranking the RGB space Euclidean distance to find the most likely color of the ring
    Grabber
    This class contains methods for the ring fetching routine and mechanism
    Localizer
    This class is used for localizing the robot using the ultrasonic sensor and the 2 line detection sensors
    Navigation
    this class is used for navigating the robot to a specific point on the grid (coordinates in cm)
    Odometer  
    OdometerData
    This class stores and provides thread safe access to the odometer data.
    Project
    This is the main class for project SCARAB;
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OdometerExceptions
    This class is used to handle errors regarding the singleton pattern used for the odometer and odometerData
